Reviews.Title: This thing is poorly constructed
Reviews.Author: Alex Pujols
Reviews.Content: This thing is poorly constructed.  It functionally works out of the box, however after adjustments over time the teeth tend to loose their "bite" and it becomes useless.  Be careful here!  Spend the extra $ and go with an all-metal construction

ProductInfo.Features:
Universal CCTV DVR Camera Wall Mount Bracket Stand Black.
It features plastic and metal constructed for long time use.
Tilt angle of the Wall Mount Camera Stand is 180 degree, lock in position.
Standard 1/4" thread size is compatible with most spy cams, CCTV cameras and DVR cameras.
This Black CCTV Camera Bracket is suitable for indoor, outdoor, wall and ceilling mounting (screws not included).
ProductInfo.Name: Gino Universal CCTV DVR Camera Wall Mount Bracket Stand Black
